attributes.review: First the cover image gives people nightmares second the app made me feel stupid just by having it in my phone  and lastly the entire premises of this app would kill the America I love so
attributes.title: Awful excúsenle a human

attributes.review: He they showed nudes and inappropriate pictures and then he was like oh I raped all of y’all’s moms last night so I am pretty sure he did because my mom wasn’t home last night
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app blew up my phone. The second I opened it kablooey. I was gonna leave a really good review too but now I can’t because I don’t have a phone and I can’t leave any reviews at all.
attributes.title: Just Awful

attributes.review: The first time I opened this app I watched one of trumps videos. I did not agree with it so I disliked it. Then my screen popped up with our president Donald j Trump cussing me out and calling me racial slurs. I am outraged at the level of racism, disrespect, and hatred towards America’s people by our “leader.”
attributes.title: I AM DISGUISTED

attributes.review: I was directed to this app because I heard they sell spray tans, but when I first clicked on the app I was shocked because there main model was completely orange!! This app needs to be deleted for the good of all people, Orange is not the look.
attributes.title: False spray tan promotion

attributes.review: i was trying to walk🚶🏻‍♀️ my goldfish 🐠 in my      👁👅👁 backyard 🏕 when i saw 👀 an ugly 🤢 fat 😵 cheeto man 🍊 pop up 💁🏻‍♀️ the second  🗯 i opened 🤲🏼 the app 📲 i will forever 🔄 be traumatized 😖 i plan on taking 👻 legal 😲 action 📝 soon ❗️for the permanent damage ❌ on my life🥳
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!

attributes.review: The Trump 2020 app is absolutely horrid. The app functions completely fine, but the content within it is terrible. Why is this app still here? Take it down!!!! 🤬
attributes.title: Disappointed but not surprised

attributes.review: This app is nothing but lies and deception. I will not support any politician who only cares about power. Not now not ever. Don’t download this app otherwise you won’t be able to escape from the lies the trump administration spreads
attributes.title: Worse App Ever

attributes.review: i open the app and immediately see an orange. i wasn’t expecting it but it happened, but next thing i know my phone starts glitching! my phone turned itself off then when i turned it back on it was completely reset. i had to redownload all my apps and my photos/videos were gone! this app is unbelievably terrible i do not recommend.
attributes.title: ridiculous

attributes.review: Anyone who likes the feeling of a metal fork scraping against your teeth, has this app. Absolutely disturbing content. It’s a no from me. In order to make the app better, add a “gEt OuT oF OfFiCe” feature on it. please and thank you. 🍤
attributes.title: An Honest Review From, -Karen
